scripts.build:prepare: rm -rf dist_final && mkdir -p dist_final/chus.me dist_final/chusme.social && mv dist/chus.me/src/index.js dist_final/chus.me/_worker.js && mv dist/chus.me/src/invite-handler.js dist_final/chus.me/invite-handler.js && mv dist/chusme.social/src/index.js dist_final/chusme.social/_worker.js
scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run build:prepare
scripts.deploy: echo 'Use deploy:chusme or deploy:social instead' && exit 1
scripts.deploy:chusme: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist_final/chus.me --project-name=chus-me
scripts.deploy:social: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist_final/chusme.social --project-name=chusme-social
